stories.original_headline: A massive gene hunt reveals how brain cells are made
stories.original_summary: A large genetic screen has revealed how stem cells transform into brain cells, exposing hundreds of genes that make this process possible. stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Uncover Ancient Secrets of Mind-Gem Creation!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Alchemists' Guild has unveiled how raw essence transforms into shimmering mind-gems. They found hidden runes that guide this delicate process, including a peculiar thread called 'PEDS1'. This new knowledge may help understand when the mind-gems grow oddly in young ones.

stories.original_headline: This wild fruit is getting a CRISPR makeover

stories.fantasy_headline: Garden Wizards Shrink Wild Sunberries for Easier Harvest!
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Garden Wizards have cast a clever enchantment upon the unruly Sunberry plant. Using ancient glyphs, they've altered its magical growth threads, making the bushy plant smaller and simpler to cultivate. This grand magical makeover promises sweeter, more abundant harvests for all!

stories.fantasy_headline: The Oracle of G Empowers Orbs with Magical Merchant Seals!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Oracle of G has declared its enchanted Orbs will now serve as bustling marketplaces. They unveiled new magical seals, allowing patrons to instantly acquire goods from great merchant guilds like the Spindleshop Clan and the Targeteers. This move stirs the ancient rivalry among the Prophetic Orb Crafters.
